scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This original autograph manuscript, La Cábalaby Jorge Luis Borges, is an extremely important addition as a study of the Cabala in original manuscript form. One of Borges' last important books dealt specifically with the topic of the Cabala. The one-page manuscript, written in Spanish, is signed and dated, circa 1943, by Borges.
